div.p: This code system http://hl7.org/fhir/us/ndh/CodeSystem/DeliveryMethodCS defines the following codes:

tr.td: Delivery not requiring provider and patient to be physically co-located, such as tele-medicine
Traditional delivery requiring provider and patient to be physically co-located.

description.value: Categories of healthcare service delivery methods.
